body:
This is unchanged. Non-differentiable outputs still affect num_inputs. (This code doesn't change num_inputs, it's set in `process_outputs` which calls it). They still have `grad_fn=None` and `requires_grad=False`.

I've added a test to `test_autograd.py` in which only one of two outputs marked non-differentiable.
